Package org.opengrok.web

Class DirectoryListing

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.web.DirectoryListing
public class DirectoryListing extends Object
Generates HTML listing of a Directory.

  • Method Details

    • printDateSize

      public void printDateSize(Writer out, File file, Date date, Format dateFormatter) throws IOException
      Write part of HTML code which contains file/directory last modification time and size. The size printed for directories will be always BLANK_PLACEHOLDER. The time printed will be string representation of the non null time or BLANK_PLACEHOLDER.
      Parameters:
      out - write destination
      file - the file or directory to use for writing the data
      date - the time of the last commit that touched file or null if unknown
      dateFormatter - the formatter to use for pretty printing dates
      Throws:
      IOException - when writing to the out parameter failed

    • listTo

      @VisibleForTesting public void listTo(String contextPath, File dir, Writer out, String path, List<String> files) throws IOException, CacheException
      Calls extraListTo(java.lang.String, java.io.File, java.io.Writer, java.lang.String, java.util.List) with contextPath, dir, out, path, and a list mapped from files.
      Parameters:
      contextPath - context path
      dir - directory
      out - writer
      path - path
      files - list of files
      Throws:
      CacheException - on error
      IOException - I/O exception

    • createDirectoryEntries

      public List<DirectoryEntry> createDirectoryEntries(File dir, String path, List<String> files) throws CacheException
      Parameters:
      dir - the directory to list
      path - virtual path of the directory (usually the path name of dir with the source root directory stripped off).
      files - list of file paths
      Returns:
      list of DirectoryEntry instances, filtered via PathAccepter
      Throws:
      CacheException - if history cache operation failed

    • extraListTo

      public void extraListTo(String contextPath, File dir, Writer out, String path, @Nullable @Nullable List<DirectoryEntry> entries) throws IOException
      Write HTML-ized listing of the given directory to the given destination.
      Parameters:
      contextPath - path used for link prefixes
      dir - the directory to list
      out - write destination
      path - virtual path of the directory (usually the path name of dir with the source root directory stripped off).
      entries - basenames of potential children of the directory to list, assuming that these were filtered by PathAccepter.
      Throws:
      IOException - when cannot write to the out parameter
